cyclone.name: OLGA
cyclone.current_location: about 320 miles SSW of Lake Charles, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: moving north, then north-northeast across the north-western Gulf toward the Louisiana Gulf Coast and the lower Mississippi Valley
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: south-central Louisiana coast, near the Cameron–Lake Charles area

weather_observation.impacted_coast: central and eastern northern Gulf Coast (LA–MS–AL)
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions possible, gusts generally below tropical-storm force (<39 mph)
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for Texas City, only minor tide anomalies possible
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to locally moderate bands, generally 1–2 inches
weather_observation.other_hazards: Hazardous seas and rip-currents along the upper Texas coast
